name: Tweet Drafts
description: Store, rate, and categorize tweet drafts. Manage your tweet ideas before publishing.

saveDraft.description: Save a new tweet draft. Returns the saved draft with its ID.

notes.description: Optional notes or context about the draft

rateDraft.description: Rate an existing tweet draft on a scale of 1-5 with optional feedback.

draftId.description: The ID of the draft to rate

categorizeDraft.description: Set or update the category of a tweet draft.

draftId.description: The ID of the draft to categorize

getDraft.description: Retrieve a single tweet draft by ID.

draftId.description: The ID of the draft to retrieve

listDrafts.description: List all tweet drafts, optionally filtered by category or minimum rating.

minRating.description: Filter to drafts with at least this rating (1-5)

limit.description: Max number of drafts to return (default 20)

editDraft.description: Edit the text of an existing tweet draft.

draftId.description: The ID of the draft to edit

deleteDraft.description: Delete a tweet draft by ID.

draftId.description: The ID of the draft to delete

getStats.description: Get summary statistics about your tweet drafts: total count, average rating, category breakdown.

ui.description: Serves the Tweet Drafts web UI. Access via GET /http/{appId}/ui in any browser. Supports ?token=ul_... for auth.
